Listing.description:
Step into comfort and style at 4732 W Dill Ave in the Martin Valley community. This spacious two-story home offers 5 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms across 2,204 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space. The open-concept layout features a bright living room, dedicated dining area, and a modern kitchen equipped with a full suite of appliances, generous cabinet space, and a walk-in pantry. Downstairs includes a private bedroom with a nearby half bath and walk-in closet—perfect for guests or a home office. Upstairs, you’ll find four additional bedrooms including a spacious primary suite with a walk-in closet and en suite bathroom. An upstairs laundry room with hookups adds everyday convenience. Enjoy a fully fenced backyard ideal for outdoor lounging or entertaining, along with an attached 2-car garage and additional driveway parking. Located near N Curry Rd and W Woodruff Rd, with easy access to I-10, and just minutes from local shops and restaurants.
_____

It has a stunning exterior that features elegant brick cladding, and a well-kept lawn with lush greenery. Enter the charming living area and be greeted by a cozy decorative fireplace, and ample space for leisure and entertainment. The stylish kitchen, which features naturally polished wood cabinets with enough storage space, beautiful worktops, and updated appliances, making daily cooking a delight. All bedrooms are nicely-sized, offering a tranquil ambiance. Washer/dryer hookups included for added convenience. The fenced-in yard is perfect for pets to roam freely, and the attached one-car garage ensures hassle-free parking. Located in proximity to Highway 78, offering convenient access to a variety of top-rated restaurants, retail shops, and business establishments. Several parks and other attractions are also close by. Don’t miss out—schedule your tour today!

Welcome to 4122 Alexander View Dr, a stunning 3-story corner townhome offering 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms across 1,887 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space. Situated in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood within a highly sought-after school district, this home is ideal for those looking for comfort, convenience, and modern upgrades. Inside, you'll find a spacious open-concept layout with a bright living area, motorized blinds, and a well-appointed kitchen featuring a large center island, electric range oven, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator—perfect for both daily living and entertaining. The upper levels offer generously sized bedrooms and multiple full bathrooms, providing flexibility and privacy. Additional features include a laundry area with washer and dryer, an EV charging port in the attached 2-car garage, and attic storage. Enjoy the benefits of being a corner unit with sizable front and side yards—ideal for outdoor enjoyment. Located just off Providence Road with easy access to NC-51, you're only minutes from the Arboretum, Strawberry Hill, shopping, dining, and major roadways. Listing.description:
Modern Luxury in East Atlanta – The Parc Townhome
Welcome to 1324 Parc Bench Rd SE, a beautifully crafted 3-bed, 2.5-bath townhome offering 1,415 sq ft of sunlit living in one of East Atlanta’s newest boutique communities. Built in 2024, this home features a sleek open floor plan, a chef’s kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, center island, pantry, and modern lighting. The spacious primary suite includes a private bath and walk-in closet. Additional perks include a 2-car garage, brand new full size washer & dryer and attic storage
Enjoy walkable access to Glen Emerald Park and a short drive to East Atlanta Village, Inman Park, and the BeltLine. Quick access to I‑20 makes commuting a breeze. HOA covers exterior maintenance and grounds for low-maintenance living.
Updated photos coming soon. Contact us today for a private tour!

Welcome to 2100 Iron Rail Ter, a beautifully updated 4 bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home. This spacious 2,466 sq ft two-story residence features a modern mix of brick and stone exterior, a covered front porch, and a 2-car garage with a polished interior floor and storage. Inside, you’ll find a bright open floor plan with high ceilings, elegant wood-style flooring throughout the main areas, and a spacious living room that flows seamlessly into a stylish kitchen with rich wood cabinetry, granite countertops, a large center island, and stainless steel appliances. The adjacent dining area is perfect for family meals or entertaining guests. The large primary suite includes a luxurious bathroom with a glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, dual vanities, and a generous walk-in closet. Additional bedrooms are bright and well-sized, and the upstairs also features flexible loft space. Enjoy the convenience of an upstairs laundry room with washer and dryer included. Step outside to a private fenced backyard with a covered patio and well-kept lawn—ideal for relaxing or letting pets roam. Located just off W Pflugerville Pkwy and I-35, this home offers easy access to major commuting routes, top-rated schools, local parks, dining, shopping, and entertainment. With community amenities like a playground and a welcoming neighborhood feel, this home is truly a standout—schedule your tour today!

The bedrooms upstairs provide plenty of closet space and share a bathroom, along with a cozy loft area. Additional benefits include an attic for extra storage and a water heater. You'll appreciate the convenience of a washer/dryer hookup in the laundry room and an attached 2-car garage. Situated in the Willow Point community, residents can enjoy access to the playground, soccer field, and pavilion amenities. Just 15 minutes from Downtown and with easy access to Loop 410 and I-10, this property also features individual garages with 2 covered spaces.

The layout includes two primary bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom, providing flexibility for multi-generational living or a private guest suite. Step outside to enjoy a fully fenced backyard, ideal for outdoor entertaining or relaxing in privacy. Nearby walking trails provide the perfect setting for peaceful strolls. The home is pet-friendly, and an attached 2-car garage adds convenience and secure parking. With stylish finishes and functional features throughout, this home offers everything you need in a prime location.

Welcome to this beautifully designed two-story home located in the desirable Lakeshore community, offering a perfect blend of comfort, space, and convenience. The ground floor features a spacious living room with an open layout, ideal for entertaining or relaxing with family. The modern kitchen includes a pantry and flows seamlessly into the dining area, which opens to a private patio—perfect for outdoor dining or quiet evenings. Upstairs, the expansive primary bedroom offers a walk-in closet, a second closet, and a private en-suite bath. Two additional bedrooms with ample closet space share a full hallway bath, making this layout ideal for families or guests. Located in the vibrant Lakeshore community, residents enjoy access to great amenities including a swimming pool and playground. This home offers the perfect combination of functional living space and community charm.
*Note images are staged and of a similar unit. _____

Welcome to 4845 Silverdene Street, a charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home spanning a comfortable 1663 sqft in a desirable East Raleigh neighborhood. As you step inside, you'll immediately appreciate the seamless flow of the open living and dining area, which effortlessly transitions into a modern kitchen, ideal for both everyday living and entertaining. The kitchen itself is a chef's delight, boasting sleek black countertops and high-quality wood cabinetry that perfectly complement a full suite of appliances, including a dishwasher, electric range oven, microwave, and refrigerator, complete with convenient bar seating. Beyond the interior, this smoke-free and pet-friendly residence offers excellent outdoor spaces, from a welcoming covered front porch perfect for morning coffee to a private backyard featuring a patio and a handy storage shed. Located with easy access to major routes such as I-540 and US-401. Don’t miss your chance to make this wonderful property your new home—apply today!

Listing.description:
Welcome to 5530 Silver Sun Dr, a beautifully designed 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offering 1,805 sq ft of bright and modern living space in the heart of the growing Waterset community in Apollo Beach, FL. This smart home is equipped with a Smart Lock, Smart Thermostat, Smart Hub, and Motion Sensor for comfort and peace of mind. Step into an open-concept layout with a spacious living and dining area, flowing into a sleek island kitchen that boasts stainless steel appliances, counter-height seating, elegant backsplash detailing, and ample cabinet space. The private primary suite features a walk-in closet and a spa-inspired bathroom with dual vanities and a glass-enclosed shower. Two additional bedrooms and a full bath offer flexibility for family, guests, or a home office, while a dedicated laundry room includes washer/dryer hookups. Enjoy the outdoors on the covered patio overlooking the open backyard, and take advantage of the attached garage for secure parking and storage. Amenities including a splash pool, gym, lake, four pools, 12 miles of scenic trails, multiple sports courts, two fitness centers, a playground, and a clubhouse with co-working space. Conveniently located just minutes from I-75 and US-41, this home combines suburban tranquility with unbeatable access to Tampa Bay's best shopping, dining, and beaches. Call to check out this great place today!
_____

Join us for a tour and fall in love! 2749 Mistwood Drive is a brand new home in the 30 West Luxury Rental Homes community in beautiful Forth Worth! The Littleton floor plan features four bedrooms and two and half bathrooms with 1891 sqft of modern living space across two floors. The open floor plan boasts a fabulous kitchen with upgraded stainless steel appliance that flows easily into the living room and dining room. The first floor primary bedroom has an attached bathroom and great walk-in closet. A laundry room and half bath complete the main floor. Upstairs, you'll find a large family room, three nicely-sized bedrooms, and a shared bathroom. Fantastic fenced in yard is perfect for relaxing, entertaining, or having fun with your furry friends
You're sure to fall in love with the charming 30 West community, a brand new development that will feature a community pool, coming Fall 2025. Located near the intersection of I-30 and the 820 W Loop, you are conveniently located close to plenty of shopping and dining options, 5 miles to Lockheed Martin, and just 10 miles from downtown Fort Worth. Easy access to Lake Worth and Benbrook Lake too! Call today to schedule a tour and get ready to be impressed!

Welcome to 5501 Sendero Springs Dr., a beautifully maintained 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home offering 2,713 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space in one of Round Rock’s most desirable neighborhoods. This property is equipped with everything you need for everyday ease, including a dishwasher, refrigerator, washer, dryer, gas range oven, and microwave. Enjoy the added comfort of a smart thermostat and a water filtration system, along with the convenience of a water softener for enhanced water quality throughout the home. Step outside to a fully fenced yard perfect for pets and outdoor enjoyment, or take advantage of the nearby walking trails and the Sendero Springs community pool just minutes away. The home is nestled near the intersection of Sam Bass Road and FM 1431, offering quick access to major routes and nearby essentials like QuickTrip, Sendero Springs Pool, Behrens Ranch Residents Center, and a variety of parks and dining options. With a spacious 2-car garage and pet-friendly amenities, this home effortlessly blends comfort, functionality, and location—don’t miss your opportunity to make it yours!
